title: Reconnecting and crashing computer
body: I've been experiencing issues with my game I would get into a game then about 15-20min in or sometimes right when we load into the game it would say the reconnecting sign then crash my computer freezing the screen. I don't know why it's doing that and is it because I updated my computer to windows 10? How would I go about fixing this problem. This has happened several times last week and I have gotten a 5 min banned timer

replies.body: You might need to readjust some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) after having updated to Windows 10. Follow that network guide, paying extra attention to port forward, flushing your DNS, and setting up your firewalls properly. Let me know if that helps!
